column3:
comment:"This refrigerator is awesome. 
You can see the size comparison against old one which was 18.5 CFT. 
The delivery was perfect and was handled with care. 
However
column4: keep in mind the green looks near to jet black if there are low lighting conditions in your house. \nOverall an amazing experience!!!"}
column8: I took the leap of faith by ordering this refrigerator from Dawlance official store via Daraz. To my surprise
column9: it turned out to be a great experience. I got a good price due to 11.11 offer and the product was delivered to my doorstep. The delivery was fast and before the estimated delivery days. The product was safely packed and handled. Really liked the way it was wrapped with doubme packing to protect it from damaging. It was a treat to unwrap it and see a brand refrigerator unveil. The refrigerator is good in quality and the cooling is also great. As for the power consumption efficiency
column10: will have to wait one month to see the difference in the electricity bill. All in all
column11: really happy with this product. Would recommend Dawlance official store for better deals and delivery comfort to everyone."}
column14: comment:"very good packing by seller nice product cooling was super very big fridge only issue with daraz team they forgot to send email to my bank and did not convert on installment"}
column17: comment:"The product is as described. Delivered without any damage. Extremely happy with the service and delivery timing"}
column20: comment:"Product was well Packed & Safely delivered without any kind of damage. I was really worried about its delivery and i also conveyed my concern about safe delivery to the Seller through Message and I was assured by the Seller not to worry at all. And Finally it arrived in Perfect condition.\nI would like to thank Daraz
column22: & Delivery Service.\nThis Refrigerator is really spacious & beautiful. It also has LED light in Freezer compartment and it has dual LED lights in Refrigerator compartment. Electricity Consumption is also very economical. I have noticed that it just took 200 Watts at max
column23: and usually it is taking below 90 watts only when its compressor is running. Its really economical electricity consumption.\nIn Short
column24: It has all the goodies/features that one can imagine in a Refrigerator.\nHighly Recommended..\nI am well Satisfied and Happy."}
column27:
comment:"This Refrigerator is awesome. The product is as described.  delivered on time and without any damage.

Thanks Dawlance and Daraz
Recommend Dawalance and Daraz"}
column30: comment:"Appreciated! \nfridge was exactly same as described. Delivered on time with proper handling. Thanks Daraz & Dawlance. "}
column33: comment:"I am giving review more than a month after purchasing. It is working great. However
column34: I would encourage you to see fridge in showroom before making final decision. I did not
column35: but everything is fine. \n\nMake sure to measure your doorway before purchasing
column36: will it get in the room where you need to use it?\n\nIt is a big fridge
column37: so ask the delivery people to assist in moving it inside. Overall
column41: comment:"The delivery had some hiccups but the product delivered in good packing. The refrigerator is working fine since last couple of days."}
column44: comment:"Great fridge! alot of space and well partioned.but there is no lock on the door. overall experience with daraz and dawlance is great delivered in 3 days. "}
column47: comment:"I am very satisfied with this application and the discount voucher given in it...thanks Daraz and all team members..\nI didn't receive invoice for my order.."}
column53: comment:"This model Avante+ inverter is a master piece. The avante+ 20 cu ft size in inverter was available at Daraz only at the time I bought. Daraz did an excellent job at packaging and delivering unit before Eid. Really happy with Daraz's splendid handling of the product. The fridge model looks beautiful. Have turned it on and the new inverter technology is super chilling at low thermostat as well. Design and build quality is superb. The LED lights in fridge and freezer illuminate the whole area beyond your expectations. Power cool and odour eliminator as well as the fresh led light in vegetable basket are well thought out. The unit came with all accessories and instructions. I have 3 dawlance fridges and they never stopped working. They are making amazing long lasting products that last very very long. It's got a huge parent company and technology behind it and they keep prices very affordable. With daraz's flagship store you are sure to get the best on time. "}
column61: comment:"excellent product not even a scratch on it packaging was very nice seller is also one the best... i love it so far"}
column77: product is as described. Was delivered within time
column93: comment:"very good experience and great value for money."}
column102: comment:"The product is absolutely amazing. Delivery was done properly. Though it was little delayed but all fine. A must buy appliance!"}
